title: Global phenomenon Stomp returns to Hampshire
text:
EXHILARATING, entrancing, endlessly inventive. 
The multi-award winning global phenomenon Stomp is back in Hampshire. 
Now entering its 23rd year, this smash hit show has entertained more than 15 million people worldwide and enthralled critics. 
For one week only, from Tuesday to Saturday, Southampton audiences have the chance to rediscover the magic at Mayflower Theatre. 
Using every day household items from paint cans and pipes to bin lids and brooms, eight energetic performers fuse dance, percussion and comedy to create a feel-good rhythmic spectacular. 
The show features new routines, new music and new choreography not seen in Southampton before. 
Stomp has no words and everyone can understand it. It has little or no melody in the traditional sense, so it doesnâ€™t matter if your taste in music is jazz, classical, dance or pop. Stomp is about rhythm, which is common to all cultures. Share article 
Tickets: 023 8071 1811 or visit mayflower.org.uk.
